name: {keyword}_command_{keyword}
value: !{botname_lowercase}

name: {keyword}_command_help
value: help

name: {keyword}_help_default_message
value:
Welcome to the {BotName} bot

!{botname_lowercase} help - To display this message
!{botname_lowercase} get subscriber <id> - Get a subscribers profile
!{botname_lowercase} get group <id> - Get a group profile
!{botname_lowercase} join <id>, <password> - Join a group by ID
!{botname_lowercase} leave <id> - Leave a group by ID

name: {keyword}_command_example2
value: !example2

name: {keyword}_help_example2_message
value:
Welcome to the {BotName} bot

!{botname_lowercase} help - To display this message
!{botname_lowercase} get subscriber <id> - Get a subscribers profile
!{botname_lowercase} get group <id> - Get a group profile
!{botname_lowercase} join <id>, <password> - Join a group by ID
!{botname_lowercase} leave <id> - Leave a group by ID

value: !example3

name: {keyword}_command_get
value: get

name: {keyword}_command_group
value: group

name: {keyword}_group_profile_message
{keyword}_group_profile_error_doesnt_exist_message
value: (N) {nickname} (ID {subscriberId}), no such group exists with ID {id}

name: {keyword}_command_subscriber
value: subscriber

name: {keyword}_subscriber_profile_message
{keyword}_subscriber_profile_error_doesnt_exist_message
value: (N) {nickname} (ID {subscriberId}), no such subscriber exists with ID {id}

name: {keyword}_none
value: None

name: {keyword}_charm_selected_message
value: {name} (ID {id})

name: {keyword}_group_no_avatar_message
value: Group does not have an avatar

name: {keyword}_subscriber_no_avatar_message
value: Subscriber does not have an avatar

name: {keyword}_not_specified
value: Not Specified

name: {keyword}_unknown
value: Unknown

name: {keyword}_command_join
value: join

name: {keyword}_permission_error_message
value: (N) {nickname} (ID {subscriberId}), you are not allowed to use this command

name: {keyword}_join_error_provide_arguments_message
value: (N) {nickname} (ID {subscriberId}), please provide the ID of the group you want me to join

name: {keyword}_join_error_group_doesnt_exist_message
value:
(N) No such group exists with ID '{args}'

{nickname} (ID {subscriberId})

name: {keyword}_join_error_group_owner_only_message
value:
(N) Only the owner of the group can request me

{nickname} (ID {subscriberId})

name: {keyword}_join_error_group_requirements_members_too_small_message
value:
(N) The requested group does not have enough members in it
There must be at least {min} members before I can join.

{nickname} (ID {subscriberId})

name: {keyword}_join_error_group_requirements_members_too_large_message
value:
(N) The requested group has too many members in it
There must be less than {max} members before I can join.

{nickname} (ID {subscriberId})

name: {keyword}_join_error_group_owner_banned_message
value:
(N) You are not allowed to have this bot in your groups ~ Bot Developer :)

{nickname} ({subscriberId})

name: {keyword}_join_error_invalid_group_id_message
value: (N) {nickname} (ID {subscriberId}), '{arg}' is not a valid group ID

name: {keyword}_join_success_message
value: (Y) {nickname} (ID {subscriberId}), I have joined the requested group

name: {keyword}_join_failed_message
value:
(N) {nickname} (ID {subscriberId}), I was unable to join the requested group
Reason: {reason}

name: {keyword}_error_unknown_reason_message
value: Unknown Reason

name: {keyword}_command_leave
value: leave

name: {keyword}_leave_error_unsupported_message
value: (N) {nickname} (ID {subscriberId}), you must provide the group ID you want me to leave

name: {keyword}_leave_message
value: (Y) {nickname} (ID {subscriberId}), I will now leave this group

name: {keyword}_leave_error_invalid_group_id_message
value: (N) {nickname} (ID {subscriberId}), '{arg}' is not a valid group ID

name: {keyword}_leave_success_message
value: (Y) {nickname} (ID {subscriberId}), I have left the requested group

name: {keyword}_leave_failed_message
value:
(N) {nickname} (ID {subscriberId}), I was unable to leave the requested group
Reason: {reason}
